name: First Game (ryiki_pierson)
description:
Supports 2 teams four-player on the same keyboard, with sound effects, and gameplay loops

Controls:

WASD and z for blue;  TFGH and v for green; IJKL and m for yellow; arrow keys and slash for red

I based the sprites off of the art for star fox and named the teams or sides after that, but the "inspiration" was made by Nintendo
